document.full_text: the smashing pumpkins will reissue their classic recordings during a three-year program that kicks off in the fall with expanded versions of three albums including their 1993 breakthrough "siamese dream," frontman billy corgan and emi music said tuesday.
document.title: smashing pumpkins to reissue albums with extras
lines_and_colors: the smashing pumpkins will reissue their classic recordings during a three-year program that kicks off in the fall with expanded versions of three albums including their 1993 breakthrough "siamese dream," frontman billy corgan and emi music said tuesday.
